ygData.subject: Re: What's the Point?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I hope this will be fixed someday.  It has been broken for as long as I remember.  If they just made a model for holding a drum, that would be enough, the
ygData.messageBody:
>
> It seems that when I play the drum those watching see me as if I were
> strumming a flute and rather than the drum I hear the sweet sounds of
> strings. Perhaps some perverse enchanter has cast a twisted illusion upon
> us. Does anyone know if perchance the great powers of magic may some day
> set this straight?
>

I hope this will be fixed someday. It has been broken for as long as I
remember. If they just made a model for holding a drum, that would be enough,
the strumming motion SORT OF looks like a tapping motion.

My guess is that it will be fixed someday, but who knows. Drums USED to look
like flutes, then they looked like chests, now they actually look like drums
(in your inventory at least) so things are getting better.

>
> On another topic, recently I attained the 7th circle of skill and after
> saving and even sacrificing a bit of personal jewelery was able to purchase
> the scroll for the Whistling Warsong of the 7th circle. Imagine my dismay
> when what I thought was newfound power had less effect though concentrated
> on me than the old 1st circle song with which we all start has on me and
> all others in my adventuring group. Can anyone encourage me that perhaps
> some day my investment in the new song will be of some value?
>

The level 7 song is quite useful. In addition to the changes you mention, it
speeds up your attacks somewhat, a small difference at first, but it gets more
noticeable later on. The level 7 song is essentially a personal-only version
of the level 10 song, Anthem de Arms.

Tip: When you get to level 10, try "juggling" both songs at the same time. You
will notice a nice synergy.

>
> Likewise, I find the Jig o' Vigor to be of no use. Have I missed some good
> and valued application?
>

Not really, it's sort of useless. Sometimes when running very long distances,
you will lose stamina. Also, if you are without food and drink you may lose
stamina at a very increased rate. Otherwise, it's not too good.

Jyzan
